name: Axolotl Virtual Pet
description: Axolotl Virtual Pet is a clicker-style Android game whose gameplay loop consists of clicking the screen to feed the axolotl, waiting a few seconds for the axolotl to lay an egg, and then selling it. With that money, players can earn upgrades to beautify the aquarium that will also help feed the axolotl, increase the aquarium size, or even breed more axolotls with unique designs. This game is still in development.
